subject: World Cup (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: In 1982, Algeria upset West Germany, 2-1. The Germans later beat Austria, 1-0, as the teams effectively spent 80 minutes trying not to score. This time, Germany is Algeria’s opponent in the Round of 16.
snippet: In 1982, Algeria upset West Germany, 2-1. The Germans later beat Austria, 1-0, as the teams effectively spent 80 minutes trying not to score. This time, Germany is Algeria’s opponent in the Round of 16.
